title: Cavendish vs. Merckx, Who Is the Tour de France GOAT? ‘Today It’s Way Harder to Win’
content:
'Those days of Merckx are over. What Cavendish did is just insane:' Belgian pro Oliver Naesen says peloton holds deep respect for what the Manxman accomplished.

Read the full article at Cavendish vs. Merckx, Who Is the Tour de France GOAT? ‘Today It’s Way Harder to Win’ on Velo.
author: ahood
